data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 845,000 people living in Yamanashi, Japan. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yamanashi, Japan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Yamanashi to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 4,784 believers in the state of Yamanashi the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Yamanashi, Japan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Deaf people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 826,724, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Yamanashi, Japan.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 4,784 believers in Yamanashi.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me
